explains: adj. 奥地利的；奥地利人的

sentences.en: In recent years the Austrian economy has outperformed most other industrial economies.
sentences.cn: 近年来奥地利的经济已经超过了其他大多数的工业经济。

sentences.en: Austrian women receive $700 a month for three years when they have their first child.
sentences.cn: 奥地利妇女在生育第一个孩子后，连续三年每月可获得700美元。

sentences.en: That tradition is said to have started when an Austrian man gave a a diamond ring tothe woman he wanted to marry.
sentences.cn: 据说这一传统来源于一位奥地利男子送了一枚钻石戒指给他想娶的女人的故事。
